title: Seasonal timing depends on the tilt of the Earth

content.question: Earth currently rotates on an axis at an angle of 23.5 degrees. If that axis changed to 20 degrees, so that the axis was closer to vertical, which of the following would be expected to occur?

choices.label: The number of days in a year would be reduced.
Earth would experience increased volcanic activity.
The amount of energy Earth receives from the Sun would increase.
Earth would experience a change in seasonal timing and length.

content.answer: Earth would experience a change in seasonal timing and length.
